ygData.subject: Re: Gnome Necros
ygData.msgSnippet: No stat wise they are better, look at eq.stratics.com s race tables they get higher Dex and Higher int.  The big plus of a DE is that his home city loves him
ygData.messageBody:
No stat wise they are better, look at eq.stratics.com's race tables they
get higher Dex and Higher int. The big plus of a DE is that his home city
loves him and he can go into "Evil" cities.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Wooldirdge [SMTP:mike@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 7:27 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Gnome Necros

<< File: ATT00001.htm >> Faction wise gnomes are better and easier to deal
with. Stats Wise that is completly false. Dark Elves make the best
Necromancer's in the game. Also another pro if being a Dark Elf Necro is
tha they get an exp bonus for that paticular Race/Class combo.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer Level 21


-Gnomes have the best stats for a necro. You will be KOS in some good
towns
-but I have found that it is easier to raise your faction than say a DE
-necro.
